name: Peppa'sDanceParty
0:
”Alexa open Peppa's Dance Party”
”Alexa launch Peppa's Dance Party”
”Alexa play Peppa's Dance Party”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peppa's dance party
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hello, I'm Peppa Pig! Oink! Welcome to Peppa's Dance Party! Join me and my friends for lots of dancing fun. Would you like to…

Listen to Music: Dance to your favorite tunes with me, Peppa! Let's move and groove together!
Sing a Song: Sing along with me! We can be the best singing duo in the world!
Play Games: Have a giggly time playing Musical Bumps and Musical Statues. Can you stay still like a statue or sit down quickly when the music stops? Let's find out!

Come on, everyone! Let's dance, sing, and play together! Oink, oink!

Want to listen to more Peppa music? Head over to Amazon Music.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
